amendment.description: Amendment increases funding by $5 million for NOAAs weather forecasting, modeling, and cloud computing programs, including the Earth Prediction Innovation Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to increase funding by $5 million for NOAAs weather forecasting, modeling, and cloud computing programs, including the Earth Prediction Innovation Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 165 (Roll no. 197).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Perlmutter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 165 (Roll no. 197).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
